mapper.select: SELECT b.INFO_NO, b.INFO_TITLE, b.INFO_CONTENT, b.INFO_WRITER, b.INFO_ENROLLDATE, b.INFO_LOC_L, b.INFO_LOC_M, b.INFO_LOC_S, b.INFO_COUNT, b.INFO_POINT, b.INFO_NOTIFY, b.INFO_PRICE, b.INFO_MAP FROM INFO_FAVORITE f, INFO_BOARD b WHERE f.FA_BD_NO = b.INFO_NO AND f.FA_MB_ID = #{mbid} ORDER BY FA_BD_NO DESC
